name: AoraCrowdsale

attributes.documentation:
@title Whitelist
@dev Whitelist contract has its own role whitelister and maintains index of whitelisted addresses.
attributes.name: Whitelist

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Whitelist constructor sets the original `whitelister` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the whitelister.
attributes.name: onlyWhitelister
addToWhitelist
addAddressesToWhitelist
isWhitelisted
changeWhitelister
WhitelisterChanged
WhitelistAdd
Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
attributes.name: IERC20

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
attributes.name: mod

attributes.documentation: @dev Fallback function. Can't send ether to this contract.

@dev signifies weather or not the argument has any value
@param usdAmount amount of US Dollars in cents
attributes.name: hasValue

attributes.documentation: @dev signifies weather or not crowdsale is over
attributes.name: crowdsaleNotOver

attributes.documentation:

@param _startOfCrowdsale new timestamp value

attributes.documentation:
@dev sets the end of crowdsale

attributes.documentation: @dev returns weather or not the presale is over

attributes.documentation: @dev returns weather or not the crowdsale is over
